metadata.title: CVE-2018-12648 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description:
The WEBP::GetLE32 function inXMPFiles/source/FormatSupport/WEBP_Support.hpp in Exempi 2.4.5 has a NULLpointer dereference.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-12648` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

exempi - 2.5.1-1build1
libexempi8 - 2.5.1-1build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: exempi package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5.1-1build1').
